name: Glimmet
description: The Ore Pokémon. It absorbs nutrients from cave walls. The petals it wears are made of crystallized poison.

abilities.name: Toxic Debris
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is damaged, it may use its reaction to emit toxic spikes. Each creature within 5ft of it must make a DEX save against a DC of this Pokémon's level + 2. On failure, the creature is poisoned.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore the poison immunity of creatures granted by their Pokémon type, and can inflict the poisoned status on poison and steel type creatures. If the target’s secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the damage, it follows the secondary type for that effect.
